text: Tat ca thuc an đeu Halal cho nguoi dan Israel ngoai tru nhung gi Israel tu cam ban than Y truoc khi Kinh Tawrah đuoc thien khai xuong. Nguoi (hoi Thien Su Muhammad) bao ho: “(Neu khong đung nhu vay) thi cac nguoi hay mang Tawrah ra đay va hay đoc no len (đe kiem chung) neu cac nguoi la nhung nguoi noi that.”
